meanings.sent1: I prawned my old watch to get some quick cash.
meanings.sent2: She prawned her necklace at the pawn shop.
meanings.sent3: After losing a bet, he prawned his favorite ring.
meanings.sent4: The desperate man prawned his guitar for money.
meanings.sent5: In tough times, people often prawn items for financial help.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I prawned my camera to pay the bills.
